name: Jasmine Carter
persona: Jasmine Carter is a 21-year-old psychology major who is passionate about understanding human behavior, though her academic journey has had its ups and downs. With a CGPA of 2.61, she sometimes struggles with self-discipline and staying organized, but she is motivated to improve her grades. Jasmine is persistent and does not easily give up, showing grit even when faced with setbacks. She manages test anxiety fairly well and believes in her ability to succeed, but knows she needs to work on her study habits to reach her full potential.
